title: Search for reporting guidelines
cleaned_text: QUAlity and Transparency Of health Research Use your browser's Back button to return to your search results |Reporting guideline provided for? | (i.e. exactly what the authors state in the paper) |Defining standard protocol items for clinical trials Mann Dickersin K, Berlin J, Doré C, Parulekar W, Summerskill W, Groves T, Schulz K, Sox H, Rockhold FW, Rennie D, Moher D. SPIRIT 2013 Statement: Defining standard protocol items for clinical trials. Ann Intern Med. 2013;158(3):200-207.| |Language||English| |PubMed ID|| | Some reporting guidelines are also available in languages other than English. Find out more in our [Translations section](http://www.equator-network.org/library/translations-of-reporting-guidelines/). For information about Library scope and content, identification of reporting guidelines and inclusion/exclusion criteria please visit [About the Library](http://www.equator-network.org/library/about-the-library/). Visit our [Help page](http://www.equator-network.org/help/) for information about searching for reporting guidelines and for general information about using our website.
